ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards]  Charming
ygData.msgSnippet: you don t have to switch targets if you are doing party buff songs as the off songs.  altho i was able to also do charm, switch, chant, chant, switch back,
ygData.messageBody:
you don't have to switch targets if you are doing party buff songs as the
off songs. altho i was able to also do charm, switch, chant, chant, switch back,
charm with little or no problems.

At 12:56 PM 5/31/00 -0400, you wrote:
>With that technique, you have to keep switching targets rights? That is
>the problem I was having, switching targets and weaving the songs...
>
>Adam Wasserman wrote:
> >
> > I usually do this:
> >
> > Charm
> > Off Song
> > Off Song
> >
> > Lack of room on my palette usually requires me to sing the same off song
> > twice, so I try to make it a useful song for the situation. (usually pixie
> > strike vs high caster concentration areas or snare if there's no druid.)
> >
>
>--
